comments: This data is based on dhc2 dataset, converted to a structured format for customer service conversations, and sampled to 100 conversations. Only resolved/unresolved outcomes are included, for simplicity.

messages.content: Last night, I waited in line for 2 hours in the business office, but because I only had a copy of my ID card and didn't bring the original, I was not allowed to cancel the broadband service, and I had to charge for suspending the service! I brought the original ID with me according to the reservation tonight, but the store manager actually said that the set-top box should be returned to cancel it or 500 yuan deposit should be paid first. Many restrictions have been imposed on customers to cancel their business, and you have not yet made it clear to customers. We need to come to the store for so many times! Is it fun to play with consumers? @ China Telecom Guangdong Customer Service Guangzhou·Jingxi

We’re very sorry, I am the Guangdong Customer Service Staff of China Telecom. I have paid attention to your feedback. We will continue to improve our service to satisfy our customers. Please continue to supervise. Thank you.
How can consumers supervise you if you don't solve your own problems?
We will continue to improve various services and improve our service quality. Thank you for your suggestion.
Nonsense. China Telecom has failed to make progress for so many years. It's simply a national shame. No wonder more and more people have decided never to use you again!

We’re really sorry for the inconvenience. I suggest that you can register feedback through 0online complaints+consultation and complaints-self-service-China Telecom Huango website· Guangdong. After registration, the processing specialist will carefully check it and reply to you. Thank you.

IPTV of @Beijing Unicom was installed by the master in the snow this morning. It's hard work! IPTV uses Huawei EC2108V3 network set-top box with 1HDMI, 1 fiber, 2USB, 1LAN and 1 color difference component. The interface is simple, and the target is Beijing IPTV. Compared with Gehua CATV set-top box, it is smaller, less CCTV6 and other channels, the definition of HD channel is average, and ordinary channel is better than Gehua. The failure rate is unknown. @Huawei Terminal Official Weibo @Gehua CATV Marketing @China Unicom Beijing Customer Service
Hello, if you have applied for the IPTV service of our company, you can pay attention to the subsequent use and contact us if you have any questions~

Today, the master braved the heavy snow to install it, from Tuanli Bureau of Tongzhou. This Weibo is mainly an objective evaluation. I have also used IPTV of China Telecom, and to be honest, it is not as good as Unicom. Give you a hand when Gehua CATV has a big market.

What if my gender is wrong? The Weibo in few days ago......The information registered on mobile phone is male......But on Unicom customer club membership card it's female......The card number is 123456789W And how to handle the shared package?

I used 4G national free combination package at first. I saw in your advertisement that local package had more traffic, so I applied to change to local package. I thought I could change it back to national package when necessary, but I learned from 123456789 staff customer service today that 4G local free combination package couldn't be changed back to 4G national free combination package. @China Unicom Beijing Customer Service You should have told me earlier...... I wouldn't change the package if you told me...... @Operator Disclosures @False Arguments of Operators

Along with the continuous development of business, our company will adjust relevant policies or charges in due time according to the market requirement. Please pay attention at any time. Thank you for your support to China Unicom!
I just want to change back to my original package.
Hello. Did you transacted it this month? Has the 4G local combination package come into force?
I changed it this month. It will come into force next month. But I don't want to change it now...... Can you help me? Thank you so much. A silver medal client needs your help.
If it's convenient, please provide your cellphone number, user name and ID number via direct message. I will check it for you.

Sogou Input Method iPhone version is not as intelligent as official build-in input method of iPhone! It’s easy to use! @ Sogou Input Method @Sogou Cellphone Input Method @Sogou Input Method Technical Support There is still large room for improvement! It makes me feel uncomfortable when I use it! My personal suggestion is to integrate Engligh input with Chinese input! Intelligent identification! Looking forward to your improvement!

Hello. What problems you encountered in the course of use make you feel it’s not good to use? Can you tell me in detail? I look forward to your opinions and suggestions~ Besides, concerning mixed input of Chinese and English, what is your operating habit? Thank you!
I have sent a private message to you! Check it!
Unicom, you are just rubbish. The signal was out of order again after being all right for a week!!! @China Unicom Guangdong Customer Service @China Unicom
Hello! I am sorry for your inconvenience. For the signal problem you mentioned, did other Unicom users nearby come across the same situation? Thanks!

| @ Guangdong Unicom @ China Unicom Guangdong Customer Service @ Guangdong Unicom Online Business Hall @ Guangzhou Unicom Which business hall in Guangzhou sells the card of other provincial attributions?  I don’t want to depend on the express delivery at the year end || Waterwei (Guang...|
Dear user! The business hall sells the card of local phone number.
Xiao Bian. Could you please help me ask which business hall near Guangpu West Road can cancel the phone card?

My cellphone started to have no signal at all from time to time when I charged it and turned off airplane mode since the morning on 13th. I did nothing to it. Sometimes the signal was weak, and after a while the signal was completely gone. The problem appeared repeatedly all day long, which severely affected my normal use, my life and my work! What's the problem? (It's always the same whenever I was in my house or in my company, which were respectively located near South Circular West Road and Shishan Road) @China Unicom Customer Service TE mode. It's H all the time. I rarely see H+. @China Unicom Customer Service
Hello. For the problem you mentioned, did other Unicom users nearby come across the same situation? Please let us know, thank you!

My colleagues had the same situation occasionally. My company is near Shishan Road and Yunhe Road. My house is near South Circular West Road. My families don't have Unicom number so I couldn't tell! I had restarted the cellphone and also tried to insert the cellphone card in another cellphone, but there was no improvement. The situation was obvious on 13th yesterday. It got better now. But there was no LTE recently.

Why can't I have the exclusive 2.4G traffic of the mall (200M local traffic per month, giving away for 12 consecutive months) and the exclusive 6G intra-provincial traffic of the mall (500M per month for 96A package only) at the same time? I just went online to check my traffic. It’s 1300M. Whether it’s 300M domestic traffic +500M intra-provincial traffic +500M WeChat directional traffic, and without that 200M local traffic? @ China Unicom Guangdong Customer Service

Honey, thank you for using China Unicom. In order to give you a more accurate reply, we need to know more information and please understand this and support it. Do you handle the package card through our online business office or other shopping malls? Please provide a link of the purchase so that we can reply to you after checking the relevant activity information in detail, thank you!
I bought it in the online business office of China Unicom, with a discount of 50% for 168 yuan set of cards, and I bought it in 84 yuan.
Honey, in order to give you a more accurate reply, would you please send a link of this package so that we can check the relevant activity information for you in more detail? Thank you!
0Website link. This is this link. I chose A package.

Honey, thank you for replying to the feedback. Regarding the question of giving away local traffic you inquired about, we inquired for you that the package card you handled also participated in our company's save one and get three preferential activities to give away 2.4G traffic. The traffic given away in this activity is 200M per month for 12 consecutive months. The traffic will be given away from the next month when the save one and get three activities take effect. please know this, thank you!

@Authentic Identification Network @MG Facial Mask Customer Service The MG Mask I bought at Wal-Mart smelled strange when I used it. After a comparison, it seemed different from the previous one. I want to verify which one is really. After all it's used on my face. It will be a big problem if it's fake!
Dear! Wal-Mart is a formal licensed manufacturer of MG facial mask. You can use it safely.
Does that mean that both kinds of packaging are real?
Yes, dear!
Then I am relieved, thank you!

@ China Unicom Customer Service Your shopping mall prescribes the reference time and the specific time shall be subject to the bank. I use the card of China Merchants Bank to complete the payment. The reference time of your shopping mall is 1 - 7 working days. It is 25 days according to the new consumer protection law, which prescribes that consumers have the right to return the goods within 7 days without any reason when the goods are sold on the network. Your shopping mall is not excluded. The operator shall return the money paid by consumers within 7 days since receiving the returned goods and consumers shall assume the postal dues.
Hello! Do you encounter the returns and refunds after purchasing our goods? Please explain in details, so that Xiao WO can solve the issue better for you.

I forgot which day I answered your phone call on, maybe Thursday. You told me that the order had been made, but I still can't check it on the mobile phone client. OK. I told you I would return it. You said you would record and reply to me. I told the customer service that I was busy on Friday. You'd best contact me after Friday. I received the phone call from 123456789 on Friday, saying you agreed with the return and refunded the money into my phone bills. Did you call me intentionally while I told you it's inconvenient for me to answer the phone calls on Friday? And you even didn't communicate with me about refunding the money into my phone bills? Then I said I wouldn't agree with it. I was too busy to talk with you. So I said you shall refund the money to me first. I checked on Monday that RMB 120 I charged was gone. But they still hadn't received my payment. I called 123456789 and asked why the refunds needed 7 - 25 work days while you can receive my payment and deduct my money immediately? According to the new customer protection law, your shopping mall also suggests the refund needs 1 - 7 work days. Why does it become 7 - 25 work days? I can't agree with this issue from the beginning. I have recorded what your customer service said to me and what I said is that you shall refund the money first and I don't agree with 7 - 25 work days. Now I just want to know which laws stipulate the refund needs 7 - 25 work days. Don't ask me to tell anything, which I have repeated for many times.

Concerning the issue you mentioned, please provide your Unicom phone number and your valid contact number via private message at your convenience and Xiao WO will verify the issue and reply to you. Thank you!

123456789. I won't cooperate with you next time if you ask me the same question. If you can't explain why the refund need 7 - 25 work days, please don't contact me. I just want to know why. What you customer service answer is the same.
Xiao WO has fed back and handled the issue you mentioned. Please pay attention to our return call. Thank you!

I ordered the mobile phone on the Telecom official website on October 16, and it has not been delivered for more than 40 days, saying that there’s no supply of goods. Jingdong has been selling it for a month. Is Telecom so poor with its service? If it weren't for the cell phone number that I bought together, I would have refunded it. The customer service called and said that the delivery date was unknown and there was no scheduled delivery date. @ China Telecom Customer Service Give me an explanation!
Excuse me, do you have any contact with the customer service of the Online Office?

I contacted the online office and e-surfing monopoly customer service, the answer given to me is that there is no stock now, and they do not know the specific delivery time. They just let me wait patiently. It's been over 40 days. Isn't this patience enough? It has been more than 40 days and the goods still could not be delivered. Such a large operator really couldn’t be like this. If there is a problem with the purchase channel and there is not enough purchase capacity, then do not learn from Mobile and Unicom to engage in activities beyond your own capacity.

It's the second time that Unicom system was hacked, which led to service malfunction of Unicom users in some regions. Why can’t you give a straight answer? Why? Are you afraid that you look inferior to other two operators to disappoint your customers? @China Unicom @123456789 Consumer Right Protection and Complaint @China Unicom Customer Service @Professor LIU Junhai @Industry and Information Technology Micro-newspaper @BTV Financial Capital Economic Report @Rule of Law in Progressive Tense@BTV Life_Life Face-to-face @Tongzhou News
Hello. Little Wo has seen your microblog. If you need any help, please provide your Unicom number and contact number to Little Wo. Little Wo will record it and feed it back for you. Thank you!

Dear, I have left my number to you. OK, 123456789 and 123456789. These are my Unicom number. But you can’t get through to them. I can’t make any call either. I just left you a Telecom number of 123456789. You never tell the truth. No promise. No reputation. What about the reply call you agreed? Gone. Well, your customer service managers and staff are all eating. Your technical staff are also eating. All is very important. We customers deserve bad luck.

Hi. Our staff is actively following up the issue you fed back. Please pay attention to the reply from our staff. Hello. Our staff is actively following the problem up for you. Please wait for their reply patiently. Thank you!

@China Unicom Shaanxi Customer Service @Xi'an Unicom Shaanxi Unicom hot line 123456789 is rubbish. The customer service staff were always busy no matter how many times I called. When are you not busy? Besides, you reminded me to use WeChat and something else. Is there anything that can be solved automatically?

Hello! We are sorry for your unpleasant experience. 123456789 is the unified service hot line to the outside of our company. When it's at the end of a month or an account period of intensive customer consultation, you may need to wait for some time for the human service. If convenient, please send your cellphone number, contact method and detailed problem to Little Wo via private message at any time. Little Wo will contact you to solve the problem soon after receiving your message. Thank you!
It doesn’t just happen at the end of a month. I can’t get through basically at any time. It's just occupied whenever I call.

Hello! We are sorry for your unpleasant experience. We will constantly improve relevant services and try our best to offer the most thoughtful and best services to users. Little Wo sincerely apologizes to you for the inconvenience again. If you need any help to solve the problem, please contact Little Wo via private message at any time. We be sincerely at your service. Thank you!
Shall I believe in the traffic data? ? Please reply @ Beijing Unicom @ ChinaUnicom Online Business Hall  @ China Unicom Shaanxi Customer Service

Hello! We are sorry for your unpleasant experience. If your phone number has opened multiple traffic data businesses, Xiao WO suggests you can inquire the subitem of Traffic Data via "China Unicom Shaanxi Customer Service" WeChat. Thank you for your attention and support in China Unicom! Thank you!
Hello! Thank you for your reply, but there is no inquiry of Traffic Data subitem in Shaanxi Customer Service WeChat and there is only inquiry of night traffic data [emoji of nose picking]
Hello! If you can't inquire the remaining traffic data via "China Unicom Shaanxi Customer Service" WeChat, you can contact staff service directly via WeChat. Hope you can understand.
It is too troublesome. The traffic data in the exclusive WO service of Web version shall be accurate.

Hello! Concerning the traffic data you reflected, Xiao WO suggests you log in the online business hall www.123456789.com, mobile business hall wap.123456789.com or "China Unicom" WeChat account to inquire the Internet browsing record of your phone. If you still need the assistance after the inquiry, please provide your phone number and contact method to Xiao WO via private message and I will check it for you soon. Have a nice day!
How can I enjoy your Ephone service if I am not at school? @ China Telecom Customer Service
Hello. Due to different situations in various places, I suggest calling the local customer service or add QQ number of 123456789 for the details.
It didn't work.

I severely complain that Unicom deducts traffic data expense arbitrarily. It often deducts several yuan or a dozen yuan in the midnight. I have never used these traffic data. It steals money from the users’ pockets flagrantly.  @ China Unicom @ China Unicom Guangdong Customer Service @ China Unicom Customer Service @ Shenzhen Media Group The First Scene @ Southern Metropolis Daily @ Shenzhen Municipal Consumer Council @ CCTV315

H Hello! We are sorry for your unpleasant feeling. If you are doubt about the data usage, Xiao U suggests you to log in our online business hall www.123456789.com with the service password to inquire your detailed phone bills. If you still have doubts after the inquiry, you can contact Xiao U again and Xiao U will follow it up for you timely. Thank you!
Nonsense. I found the problem after the inquiry. I have made phone calls to complain against you several times.

H Hello! Concerning the problem you fed back, there are some mobile softwares running in the background simultaneously, which can waste the traffic data easily. Please disable the Internet access when it is not used. Thanks!
Bull Shit. Do you ask me to disable it manually every day? Can’t you design a setting? Could you please tell me why it is deducted in the evening, not in the daytime? It is roguery.

H Hello! We are sorry for your trouble. Concerning the problem you fed back, we will constantly optimize the system, perfect the shortcomings of our service and try our best to provide better service to the users. You are welcome to contact us any time if you need assistance. Thank you!

Asking for recommendations. Asking for introduction! China Mobile has launched a mobile wifi device of 600 yuan per year for 5G data monthly. But I always think that 3G of China Mobile sucks. Do you have better one? @ China Telecom Beijing Customer Service @Beijing Unicom
Jingnier has both time-measured and data-measured plans. Dear, how long do you use the Internet daily, or what do you do online generally? Jingnier will give you some recommendations.

I use the Internet from time to time. Basically I update the microblog, surf websites, and chat online. I don't play games or watch films online. I listen to music occasionally. So I want to ask if you have suitable plan for me.
Honey, 300 yuan Telecom WLAN card has 6G data. It can be used for 180 days.
It's more expensive than Mobile. They offer monthly package of 5G data for 50 yuan.
China Unicom, can you give me a reason to love your 3G network again? Can you provide stable 2G network? I don't ask for 3G network. OK, I know you cannot. @China Unicom Customer Service Fujian

Hello. It takes time to improve the network. Since you report the network problem, we will check it and take records as the basis for base station construction. We always pay great attention to network building and will improve the network based on actual needs. Please pay attention to it.
Dear, it has been three months. For such a time, the Rubber Duck has its H7N9 cured. I quit China Unicom this afternoon.

I'm sorry for any inconvenience. We have recorded the problem mentioned by you (number ending with 6747). It will be checked and handled by related personnel. Please pay attention the call from 123456789. Thanks.
@Youbao Customer Service It was empty again. The clearance frequencey was not enough.
Dear, what is the number of this machine?
Both of these two machines were empty. 123456789 and 123456789.
OK. We have informed the staff.

Smartisan, what happened to you? The signal is always intermittent. Even when the signal is full, I can't make a call or receive a call. What's the matter with you? Why can't so many powerful engineers find out the problems with Smartisan? It has been repaired twice, but it still can't be used normally. The main board card slot has been replaced, what else should I do? @Smartisan Technology Customer Service @Luo Yonghao @Smartisan Technology
If it's convenient, please provide your contact information, we will carefully verify the maintenance of your mobile phone and make proper solutions.

I contacted 400 customer service at 9:00 in the morning. The customer service said that the engineer should contact me, but I'm still waiting at this moment. I have given up hope. I have repaired it twice, and they said that all kinds of inspections could not find any problems. Why can I find the problem as soon as I take it, but there are so many powerful engineers who can't find the problem? The problem about the intermittent signal of Smartisan mobile phone in the previous paragraph was answered by netizens. It seems to be very common now. Smartisan, what happened?
We learnt that the staff has contacted you. Please send it back to us as soon as possible. If you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us.

I want to say one thing. These days, when I used QQ music, my Smartisan couldn’t operate smoothly. Moreover, when I closed the screen to listen to music, the sound would stop and suddenly resume from time to time. But if I lighted the screen, the problem wouldn’t occur. Smartisan @ Customer Service of the Smartisan @ Luo Yonghao
Please try to double click the Home button and press the QQ music button for long to store QQ music at the backstage. Do you still see that it is being cleared while closing the screen?
It’s always in the backstage.

You can go to Safety Center - App Access Management - Backstage Auto Start to disable some apps which are not necessary to start automatically. It can save you some memory space, avoiding music apps being killed due to inadequate memory space.
OK, I’ll try. I just found that I only allowed QQ, WeChat and WeBlog to start automatically, except for some system apps. Only three of them. Is that too many?
Do other apps except for QQ music have the same problem? If only this app goes wrong, you can try to uninstall and reinstall it to see if it turns to normal.
I haven’t checked that carefully.

China Telecom, please be a conscience enterprise. Monopolizing the university market, with high network fees providing the lowest service, slowest network every day, and phones unable to connect to the network in the dormitory. Compete fairly with other companies in universities if you have the ability. China Telecom, please be a conscience enterprise, @China Telecom @China Telecom Customer Service
Hello, please provide the broadband account number, broadband address, and your name and contact information in direct message, we will feedback and verify for you;
Oh, please don't monopolize the broadband of universities. I want to use Unicom in Sichuan.

@Vivo Customer Service @vivo Smart Cellphone @FuntouchOS I had been exhausted for half a night. The cellphone couldn't be used after it's upgraded to 2.0. Once the screen went blank, it couldn't be waken up. It took at least 2 to 3 seconds to respond to any operation, even for swiping the screen on the desktop. Cellphone model is xshot x710L Elite Version

Hi, you can try to degrade your cellphone to the Funtouchos1.2 version. The download link and updating tutorial of the upgrade kit of xshot: O web page link. Download the degrading package of corresponding models in Upgrade Kit Downloading.
The web version of "Find My Phone" you designed is of no use. I've changed several browsers, failing to start my mobile phone. @Smartisan Customer Service @Smartisan @Luo Yonghao Urumqi
But we can start your mobile phone. Could you please change the network if possible?
Thanks. After I changed the browser to that of a Chrome kernel, the problem was solved.
All right.
@ Smartisan Customer Service Why the QQ can’t be displayed in the backstage often? Is it a bug?
Hi, we are sorry for your inconvenience. What is your cellphone system version?
Don’t be so polite. The system version is 268.
I know. I will feed back the information to the test engineers for analysis and we will try the best to repair it.
OK!

I took the subway with a golden iPhone. When I looked up, there's 3 golden one infront of me. I lost my face, so I took out the iPad Air 4G version in Hong Kong and used the Telecom 3G network to read Weibo. Damn it, the current 4G is too fucking expensive, but the card of @China Telecom Beijing Customer Service is affordable. It only takes 50 yuan for 3.8 G traffic data.
Honey, thank you very much for your valuable suggestions. 4G tariffs will continue to be favorable, so please pay attention to it again~
The discount has been stopped at present.
Honey, we will give feedback for yur needs, please pay attention to it with us~
Well, then, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology is shameless.

My T2 has just been used for half a year. I was using it just now, but suddenly the HOME button failed: I can't turn off and light the screen. I can only turn on or off the power supply to light the screen, and I can't turn it off, but I can use it normally after lighting the screen. What is the reason? Hoe to deal with it? Thank you! @Smartisan Technology Customer Service

Hello, please check here to see if there is after-sales service outlets near you: 0 offline repair outlets-Smartisan Technology. You can go there for inspection and treatment. If there are no offline outlets in your area, please submit your after-sales service requirements at our t.tt official website, and an after-sales service personnel will contact you as soon as possible.
OK, thank you.
You're welcome. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions in future.
OK.
This is your network. It's okay to open anything else. I can't even spend money on you. @China Telecom Customer Service @China Telecom Hebei Customer Service
Hello, please contact us by direct message, thank you!
Forget it. There's free Wi-Fi when I found a hotel. I want to order an extra traffic package. But I couldn't connect it.

@Beijing Unicom Online Business Hall I subscribed to the offer for old users launched at Double Eleventh Day both at the app and your official website. However, they were not implemented up to now. Customer service representatives of 123456789 say they are not responsible. Online customer service representatives gave no reply and were ill-mannered. What on earth do you want? Why is it always so annoying retrospecting the long history of using Unicom service? Can’t you have a little improvement on your service? China Unicom @ China Unicom Beijing Customer Service
Hello, what service are you subscribing to?

Old customer prepaid to waive the phone fare Today I subscribe to the service again. I subscribed for a few times before but nobody replied me. Hence I cancled prior subscriptions and applied again. I have no idea how long I have to wait.

If users using our service for two years or above subscribe to a 4G nationwide service plan, they will get 240 yuan phone fare rewards with 0 yuan. Order online and please pay attention to your order status.
I followed. And then? Am I going to wait forever?
Due to the high participation rate of users, it takes some time for the orders to be handled. Please stay tuned.

@LeTV Super TV @LeTV Customer Service @LeTV, I bought the Super TV s50 in June and it broke down. The after-sale staff told me the mainboard fails. I'm speechless. How shoddy the quality is. And there's no guarantee that no other problem might pop up later. And I will be charged if I change the mainboard when the warranty service expires.
Please rest assured that our TVs work fine in most cases.
I used to be a big fan of your products. And I just purchase for another year of membership on September 9. But now, ugh�
We apologize for any inconvenience. Our after-sale staff will deal with it soon. Please rest assured.
Can you at lease send me a new one? This will make me feel better.

Hello. Why doesn’t the scientific calculator in landscape mode display the computational process? For example, 24.75÷（75.45-7.586）. Isn't the cellphone calculator used in case of emergency? There is no paper and pen ……@ Smartisan Customer Service
Hello. Currently the calculator displays the instant result, not the computational process.

It’s not a big deal in vertical-mode calculator. But it's very inconvenient to do more complicated calculation with calculator in landscape mode. It's quite good-looking, but practicability is also important right?

@91 Mobile Phone Software Customer Service I updated itunes11 before ios7 was updated, and then itunes backed up itself. But now I failed to restore the backup after upgrading itunes.  There is no error code, but computer C is full now.  Is it impossible to recover? @91 Mobile Phone Software Customer Service @91 Mobile Phone Software Customer Service
Hello, you can contact Apple Customer Service as well.
What’s the number?
OK.
Hello, thank you for your support. We will definitely work harder.

Just now I searched the Internet and it seemed that Guangdong Unicom was the only Unicom branch in China which doesn't have the activity of prepaying the phone bill and getting free LUMIA 920. It only has the promotion activity of buying the mobile phone and getting free phone bills. Many users will turn to choose other phone models owing to the cost consideration. You know the reason @ China Unicom Guangdong Customer Service @ NOKIA

Hello! Concerning the issue you fed back, there is no auch activity of prepaying the phone bill to get free LUMIA 920 temporarily on the online business hall. You can go to neighboring business hall to consult relevant information. Thank you!
Is your online information inconsistent with offline information? If there are differences, I will go there to consult, otherwise I will make a trip in vain.

I just want to ask, how many hours do I need to make a phone call for 600 yuan per month, and how many TV plays do I need to watch to run this out? Who will dare to use Unicom when you collect huge fees in disorder!? @China Unicom @China Unicom Online Business Office @China Unicom Hunan Customer Service
Hello! In order to help you to verify the relevant reasons as soon as possible, please provide the specific mobile phone number for platform inquiry and implementation. Thank you!
I’ll send you my phone number in direct message.
OK.

I'm using the Telecom card and owed 2.8 yuan, then I was inexplicably "suspended from service". The phone bill owed was far lower than the credit limit. What is even worse is that I cannot charge the bill. I can't charge in the actual business hall, and the online payment order has been returned!!! I called 123456789 and no one answered my complaint. I can't make calls now. Please give me an explanation. @China Telecom Customer Service @China Telecom @China Telecom Henan Customer Service @China Telecom Xinxiang Branch
Hello, please provide your business account number and your name and contact information in direct message. We'll feedback and verify it for you.
I've sent the direct message. Please check it.
T1, there is a bug in the long screenshot. The next edition needs to solve it. @Smartisan Technology Customer Service @Chi Jianqiang Shanghai Rihui... http://t.cn/R4Rwa4g.
Hello, which version of operating system are you using now?
V2.5.2, the problem is not only my own and it's not problem of QQ, because the same problem exists in official forums and Baidu Post Bar with long screenshots. It's rarely succeed.
Thank you for your reply, we will record and feedback it.
OK, I remember that the beta version of 2.5 is normal, so solve it as soon as possible.

Hello, regarding the deviation of the thumbnail of the mobile phone frame in the screenshot that you have fed back, we have fixed this problem in 2.5.3 update. You can contact us if you have any questions in the future. Welcome to continue to give your valuable comments on our products. We will continue to make efforts to constantly improve our products. Thank you again!

See is not always believing~ I really feel that I don't know why they said it's delicious. Is it because I go to some other restaurants too often I feel that you are not as good as them? I really don't think it's good, OK? I didn't order much. But I spent over 140 yuan. I don't wanna talk about money. I just think it's a rip-off. Even people like me who don't quite eat spicy food have to order medium spicy. But where is the pungent and spicy flavor? I really can't say it's delicious against my will @Jinan Food Sina Microbrog @Easy Chill.i Jinan Customer Service
Hi, you are welcome to put forward your suggestions and advices on our problems. We will improve them.
I suggest that you can go for some learning and exchange. Hot-spicy pot is not sauce pot. You don't have pungent or spicy flavor. Maybe it's because I expected too much~
What soup base did you order? You can try heavy spicy with extra pepper and chilli. [Ho-ho]

When I tried to use this function, I was notified that the phone can't be located once the data is wiped from the phone. Do you mean the Find Phone function in the Smartisan Cloud Service? Yes, the function has been enabled, but I think the function is used to track the mobile number. Since I've applied for a new SIM card, the mobile phone that I am using now is tracked.

You can still locate your mobile phone after wiping the data from the phone in the Smartisan Cloud Service. However, the missing mobile phone must be connected to the Internet. Sorry, we need to correct the previous reply. If you use the Wipe function for a mobile phone, you'll lose control of this phone and wipe all data from the phone.

In this case, you put us in a dilemma. If we choose not to wipe the data, we can't protect our privacy; if we choose to wipe the data, we'll lose contact with our missing mobile phones. Has Mr. Luo ever thought of such a severe problem?

The memory is 4G in all and there is less than 1G left. All applications that can be moved to the phone memory have been moved and there are still 20G capacity. But it has become exceptionally jammed. Most programs are still in the phone memory and can’t be moved, which influences the operational speed severely. So the 20G is totally useless. The new cellphone will be released tomorrow. I hope you will not make the phones that have parameters, but can’t be used. I really can’t tolerate the jamming. @ Meitu Phone @ Official Customer Service of Meitu Phone.

Dear! It is the system problem of Android phone. There are much more trash cache left after daily use, which will occupy the running memory of the phone. You are suggested to download “Clean Master” to clear the trash cache. Meanwhile, unwanted wechat and QQ chat history can be deleted suitably, so as to prevent occupying the running cache and causing the running speed to slow down.

But still no more applications can be installed. 20G application can’t be installed no matter what are done. It is estimated that one more G will suggest the memory is insufficient and the bigger phone capacity is really a waste. I dare not install any programs, which will aggravate the memory running burden.

As what you have seen, the memory is divided into two parts. The aforesaid system memory space is the default installation disk of the software. You move the software from the “system memory space” to the following “User Storage Space”. Let's see the second screenshot. It’s temporarily only the above default disk that is full, but the disk below still has a lot of space. You can click Setting - Advanced Setting - Application. These in the “Downloaded” column are installed in the system memory space. You can click the downloaded softwares on the page one by one and move them to the phone memory. Or you can use PC version 360 Phone Assistant directly to move them, which is much more convenient. And it is more intuitional whether the software can be moved.

I have already done this. I studied computer during the undergraduate study, so I am familiar with such concepts as internal memory, external memory and data call and theory of computation. You don’t need to explain them to me in detail.
Dear! Xiao Mei will feed back your suggestions to the company timely and we try to make improvements in the subsequent research and development. We are very sorry for the inconvenience.
